sqlMap.select:
SELECT SEC_OBJID as secObjid, NAME as name, SEC_OBJ_INDEX as secObjIndex, SEC_OBJ_TYPE as secObjType, NUM_ITEMS as numItems, POINTS_POSSIBLE as pointsPossible, NATIONAL_AVERAGE as nationalAverage, PRIM_OBJID as primObjid, assessmentid as assessmentid FROM SEC_OBJ_DIM
WHERE SEC_OBJID = #secObjid:NUMERIC#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO SEC_OBJ_DIM ( SEC_OBJID, NAME, SEC_OBJ_INDEX, SEC_OBJ_TYPE, NUM_ITEMS, POINTS_POSSIBLE, NATIONAL_AVERAGE, PRIM_OBJID, assessmentid ) VALUES ( #secObjid:NUMERIC#, #name:VARCHAR#, #secObjIndex:NUMERIC#, #secObjType:VARCHAR#, #numItems:NUMERIC#, #pointsPossible:NUMERIC#, #nationalAverage:NUMERIC#, #primObjid:NUMERIC#, #assessmentid:NUMERIC# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE SEC_OBJ_DIM SET NAME = #name:VARCHAR#, SEC_OBJ_INDEX = #secObjIndex:NUMERIC#, SEC_OBJ_TYPE = #secObjType:VARCHAR#, NUM_ITEMS = #numItems:NUMERIC#, POINTS_POSSIBLE = #pointsPossible:NUMERIC#, NATIONAL_AVERAGE = #nationalAverage:NUMERIC#, PRIM_OBJID = #primObjid:NUMERIC#, assessmentid = #assessmentid:NUMERIC# WHERE SEC_OBJID = #secObjid:NUMERIC#

UPDATE SEC_OBJ_DIM SET NAME = #name:VARCHAR#, SEC_OBJ_INDEX = #secObjIndex:NUMERIC#, SEC_OBJ_TYPE = #secObjType:VARCHAR#, NUM_ITEMS = #numItems:NUMERIC#, POINTS_POSSIBLE = #pointsPossible:NUMERIC#, NATIONAL_AVERAGE = #nationalAverage:NUMERIC#, PRIM_OBJID = #primObjid:NUMERIC# WHERE SEC_OBJID = #secObjid:NUMERIC# AND assessmentid = #assessmentid:NUMERIC#
